duties_responsibilities.duty: Slaughter poultry missed by automated machine process.
Work in compliance with company policies, NCC Animal Welfare Guidelines, and local, state, and federal policies, laws, and regulations.
Perform work in compliance with company policies, NCC Animal Welfare Guidelines, and local, state, and federal policies, laws, and regulations.
Work nights, weekends, holidays, and extended shift hours.
Be exposed to heat (95ºF, 7ºC) and cold (45ºF, 4ºC).
Be exposed to noise of > 85 decibels, CO2, and moving production equipment.
Work around raw blood and live animal odors.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent preferred, but not required.
